participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, Oliver enjoys engaging in conversations about pets and nature.
participant_1.background: Growing up in a rural area, he has always been fond of animals and often volunteers at local shelters.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Playful and outgoing, Sophie loves to chat about her experiences and share funny stories about her pets.
participant_2.background: Having lived in the city, she has a couple of cats and often visits animal cafes.
